title: Beach Front Villa in Midigama
details: Beach front villa built in 2003 on 60 perches, 1,500m2, of land surrounded with mature trees and gardens. The property offers 4 en-suite bedrooms, staff accommodation and a swimming pool. Ideally located by one of the famous surf break beaches south of Galle Fort. The property is in need of some minor cosmetic renovations. Very attractively priced as a quick sale is desired.
